tool_description:
Convert text to audio quickly, supports over 99+ languages ​​and 3900+ speakers. 
Choose from our neural or google engine and many options for different AI voices. This api is made in India.
name: Text To Speech Neural/Google
title: Text To Speech Neural/Google

api_list.name: Fetch Voices
api_list.description: fetch all voices related to languages separated by category, use the languageCode, engine and name of that voice to generate specific voice using the generateAudio api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-neural-google.p.rapidapi.com/v1/synthesis/client-voices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-neural-google.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-neural-google.p.rapidapi.com/v1/synthesis/client-voices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-neural-google.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
